original_text: After him, the next officer was Jehozabad. He had authority over 180,000 soldiers who had their weapons ready to fight.
korean_text: 그 다음은 여호사밧이라 싸움을 준비한 자 십팔만 명을 거느렸으니

sentences.original_text: After him, the next officer was Jehozabad.
who had their weapons ready to fight.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 병사들은 싸울 준비가 된 무기를 가지고 있었습니다.
